attributes.action: Put david Cameron on minimum wage for the next 6 months and/or send him to syria
attributes.background: David Cameron thinks he's doing a great job in charge of this country. Let him live on minimum wage for 6 months with no access to previous savings and see how he fares. That might put into perspective some of the things he is doing wrong.

rejection.details:
However you might wish to consider signing the following petition, which is on a related issues where Parliament could take action.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471
